thread.title: Watch: White House takes questions as trade issues remain in focus

author: cnbc.com
title: Watch: White House takes questions as trade issues remain in focus
text:
Watch: White House takes questions as trade issues remain in focus 1 Hour Ago CNBC.com 
[The stream is slated to start at 2 p.m. ET. Please refresh the page if you do not see a player above at that time.] 
Press secretary Sarah Huckabee Sanders is scheduled to take reporters' questions at the White House on Tuesday. 
Trade issues remain in focus, particularly as the White House keys in on China's practices. 
The Stormy Daniels controversy is also still in the headlines, after the adult-film actress sued President Donald Trump's personal lawyer, Michael Cohen, for defamation. CNBC NEWSLETTERS
